scripts.test:all: bun run test && bun run test:interface
scripts.verify: bun run typecheck && bun run build && bun run test:all && bun run verify:ui
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names daemon,dashboard "bun run --cwd apps/daemon start" "bun run --cwd apps/dashboard dev"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names daemon,dashboard "bun run --cwd apps/daemon dev" "bun run --cwd apps/dashboard dev"
scripts.start:all: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names daemon,dashboard,cli "bun run --cwd apps/daemon start" "bun run --cwd apps/dashboard dev" "sleep 3 && bun run --cwd apps/cli start"
